title: Mini-Ep 99: Do It Now
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 99: Do It Now
itunes:subtitle: On this mini-ep, Kate and Doree receive a new perspective on workplace diet culture, share listeners' thoughts about white lies, and get some advice on how to conquer your to-do List. Plus they hear from a listener trying to figure out self-care w...
description:
On this mini-ep, Kate and Doree receive a new perspective on workplace diet culture, share listeners' thoughts about white lies, and get some advice on how to conquer your to-do List. Plus they hear from a listener trying to figure out self-care while quarantined due to COVID-19.


Listen to our new daily podcast Here For You on Apple Podcasts or ACast.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • AERA - Go to aeraforhome.com for 20% off diffusers and free shipping with the code FOREVER35.
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • ROTHY’S - For free shipping and free returns/exchanges, visit rothys.com/forever35.
  • YOGASLEEP - Go to Yogasleep.com/FOREVER35 to save an exclusive 20% off a sound machine for natural sleep. 
  • TALKSPACE - Get your first week free of Talkspace when you visit talkspace.com use promo code FOREVER35.
  • MOLEKULE - For $75 off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER75 at checkout.
  • FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.
  • EVERYDAY UBUNTU - You can purchase EVERYDAY UBUNTU from your favorite audiobook retailer or visit penguinrandomhouse.ca to learn more!


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
